title: Wonderful San Francisco 1940s in Color [60fps, Remastered] w/sound design added
description:
I colorized, restored and created a sound design for this video of Wonderful San franscisco 1940s, we can clearly see what is happening in broad daylight, We are on a beach in the middle of summer with a lot of people, after two still shots we can see Fisherman's Wharf and a lot of stores open with people doing their shopping and their vehicle parked in the sidewalk 

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source from: Internet Archive
B&W Video Source: https://archive.org/details/pet1188r1sf
